data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Ilyocryptus Sars, 1862 (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Ilyocryptidae) from the East Asian Palaearctic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jeong, Hyun Gi, Kotov, Alexey A., Lee, Wonchoel (2012): A new species of the genus Ilyocryptus Sars, 1862 (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Ilyocryptidae) from the East Asian Palaearctic. Zootaxa 3475: 36-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209512
